manifest: Manifest for building NDK shader-tools from master. To build this project on Linux and Mac: cmake src/shaderc -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo cmake --build . Then executables are in: glslc/glslc third_party/spirv-tools/spirv-as third_party/spirv-tools/spirv-dis third_party/spirv-tools/spirv-val To build this project on Windows: cmake src/shaderc cmake --build . --config RelWithDebInfo Then executables are in: RelWithDebInfo/glslc/glslc RelWithDebInfo/third_party/spirv-tools/spirv-as RelWithDebInfo/third_party/spirv-tools/spirv-dis RelWithDebInfo/third_party/spirv-tools/spirv-val
